---
id: evidence-query-upgraded-consensus-state
title: "UpgradedConsensusState queries the consensus state that will serve
as a trusted kernel for the next version of this chain. It will only be
stored at the last height of this chain.
UpgradedConsensusState RPC not supported with legacy querier
This rpc is deprecated now that IBC has its own replacement
(https://github.com/cosmos/ibc-go/blob/2c880a22e9f9cc75f62b527ca94aa75ce1106001/proto/ibc/core/client/v1/query.proto#L54)"
description: "UpgradedConsensusState queries the consensus state that will serve"
sidebar_label: "UpgradedConsensusState queries the consensus state that will serve
as a trusted kernel for the next version of this chain. It will only be
stored at the last height of this chain.
UpgradedConsensusState RPC not supported with legacy querier
This rpc is deprecated now that IBC has its own replacement
(https://github.com/cosmos/ibc-go/blob/2c880a22e9f9cc75f62b527ca94aa75ce1106001/proto/ibc/core/client/v1/query.proto#L54)"

<MethodEndpoint

  path={"/cosmos/upgrade/v1beta1/upgraded_consensus_state/{last_height}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



UpgradedConsensusState queries the consensus state that will serve
as a trusted kernel for the next version of this chain. It will only be
stored at the last height of this chain.
UpgradedConsensusState RPC not supported with legacy querier
This rpc is deprecated now that IBC has its own replacement
(https://github.com/cosmos/ibc-go/blob/2c880a22e9f9cc75f62b527ca94aa75ce1106001/proto/ibc/core/client/v1/query.proto#L54)

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"last height of the current chain must be sent in request\nas this is the height under which next consensus state is stored","name":"last_height","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"int64"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"A successful response.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"QueryUpgradedConsensusStateResponse is the response type for the Query/UpgradedConsensusState\nRPC method.","type":"object","properties":{"upgraded_consensus_state":{"type":"string","format":"byte"}}}}}},"default":{"description":"An unexpected error response.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"code":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"details":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"@type":{"type":"string"}},"additionalProperties":{}}},"message":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
